channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Video Slider – Slider Carousel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Video Slider – Slider Carousel

item.title: CVE-2022-1541|2024-08-03T00:10:02.951Z -- unknown -- video%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20slider%20carousel
item.description: The Video Slider WordPress plugin before 1.4.8 does not sanitize or escape some of its video settings, which could allow high-privileged users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
